title: Gourmet Weekend Escape: Sofitel Luxury with Room Upgrade & Dining Inclusions
description: Discover the gourmet delights of Wellington - claiming more bars and restaurants per capita than New York City - with a luxe weekend escape at the five-star Sofitel Wellington. This stylish city offers first-class dining experiences and fine wines from the nearby Martinborough region. Stay in an upgraded room at this centrally located property, currently rated #2 in the entire city on TripAdvisor. Your weekend foodie escape is complete with daily breakfast, a tapas plate with a glass of wine each on one evening of your stay and 15% off additional food and beverages purchased at the hotel.
offer_address: 11 Bolton St, Wellington, 6011, New Zealand

title: Stylish Weekend Escape in Wellington with Daily Breakfast and Drinks
description: Unleash your inner art critic as you unravel a new piece of curated art and get lost in the unique style and cool vibe of QT Wellington with a weekend escape. Sitting in the heart of Wellington’s harbourside, engulfed in lush vines with the best of the capital of culture right at your doorstep, you can’t get closer to the action than here! Awarded TripAdvisor’s Hall of Fame in 2019, discover the epitome of quirky, award-winning chic with a guaranteed upgrade from a QT Deluxe King Room to a QT Gallery King Room, daily buffet breakfast, a daily drink of your choice from 3pm, a one-time 15% food discount for the French-inspired Hippopotamus restaurant and a guaranteed 2pm late checkout.
offer_address: 90 Cable St, Te Aro, Wellington 6011, New Zealand

title: Wellington Brand-New Boutique Luxury in Former Cadbury Factory with Daily Breakfast & Bar Credit
description:
Wellington's vibrant, creative culture beckons - and The Intrepid Hotel makes the perfect excuse to explore the history, nature and cuisine of Lonely Planet's 'coolest little capital in the world'. Commanding an enviable city-centre position, a stone’s throw from lively Cuba Street, this four-story, heritage-listed building is the place to be and be seen following a three-year, multimillion-dollar refurbishment. Formerly a Cadbury chocolate factory, this boutique complex now offers 18 luxurious, industrial-chic rooms - each stripped back to their raw brick beauty. From the visually aesthetic lobby, adorned with locally inspired artwork, old-world charm and moody, deep colours (with zero replicas or hotel art clichés in sight), to the historic interior touches, this urban sanctuary is a contemporary hideaway and perfect nod to Wellington's alternative side.

Standing proud in the heart of the Te Aro neighbourhood, on vibrant Ghuznee Street, the hotel is ideally located in the thick of the action. Chic cafés, stately-but-far-from-stuffy fine dining restaurants and independent boutiques rub shoulders with the city’s must-see attractions - Museum of New Zealand Te Papa Tongarewa, Wellington Cable Car and Wellington Botanic Garden are a short drive away. Back at the hotel, head down to Puffin - complete with plush velvet booths and taxidermied birds - to sate your thirst with a variety of natural and organic wines, classic cocktails and craft beers, accompanied by delicious nibbles.
offer_address: 60 Ghuznee Street, Te Aro, Wellington 6011, New Zealand

title: Chic City Escape in New Zealand’s Striking Capital
description: Discover why so many people say Wellington is their favourite New Zealand destination while staying in city-chic style at the Rydges Wellington, perched downtown with spectacular harbour views. With supposedly more bars and restaurants per capita than New York City, expect gourmet dining experiences and fine wines from the nearby Martinborough region, all while staying in a convenient, central location with daily buffet breakfast, a bottle of local red or white wine, guaranteed late checkout and discounts on local experiences.
offer_address: 75 Featherston St, Pipitea, Wellington 6011, New Zealand

title: Quirky QT Wellington Escape with Daily Breakfast & Drinks
description:
Unleash your inner art critic and get lost in the unique, cool vibes of QT Wellington with a New Zealand city escape. Located in Wellington’s harbourside, engulfed in lush vines with the best of the capital of culture right at your doorstep, this unique hotel takes you close to the action.

Discover the epitome of quirky, award-winning style with a stay in a QT Gallery King Room including daily breakfast, a daily drink per person at any on-site restaurant or bar (choice of glass of house wine, house beer or soft drink) and a 15% dining discount for the French-inspired Hippopotamus restaurant.
offer_address: 90 Cable St, Te Aro, Wellington 6011, New Zealand

title: Grand Opening: Eclectic Wellington Designer Stay with Nightly Cocktails
description:
Set against Wellington’s fabulously fashionable Cuba Street precinct, the breathtaking 100-year-old Naumi Studio Hotel Wellington has been reimagined as an exquisitely designed haven. Dazzling from the moment you enter, this elegantly refurbished hotel is a feast for the senses, featuring a collection of uniquely styled common areas that pay homage to the hotel's history and future.

Every nook and cranny of this stylish hotel tells a story - inspired by Lady Naumi, the original custodian of the hotel, and her tale of lost love - with eccentric style, top-tier facilities and a location that’s equally mesmerising. Tucked away in central Wellington, you'll be just moments from Cuba Street’s multitude of dining institutions, entertainment and retail attractions with the waterfront Museum of New Zealand Te Papa Tongarewa and the city’s iconic red cable car just a short stroll away.
offer_address: 213-223 Cuba Street, Te Aro, Wellington 6011, New Zealand

title: Five-Star Sofitel Luxury in Stylish Wellington
description: Discover why so many people say Wellington is their favourite New Zealand destination while staying in boutique luxury at the five star Sofitel Wellington, rated the #2 hotel in the whole of the city. With supposedly more bars and restaurants per capita than New York City, expect gourmet dining experiences and fine wines from the nearby Martinborough region, all while staying in an upgraded room at this centrally located property with daily breakfast, a bottle of local red or white wine, dining discount, late checkout and more included.
offer_address: 11 Bolton St, Wellington, 6011, New Zealand

title: Experience Wellington at One of the City's Newest and Highest-Rated Hotels
description: Discover the compact and vibrant city of Wellington with a stay at DoubleTree by Hilton, ideally located steps away from the CBD and ranked in the top 10 hotels in the city. With more bars and restaurants per capita than New York City, expect gourmet dining experiences and fine wines, all while experiencing Hilton's renowned service and enjoying daily breakfast, a glass of sparkling on arrival plus a complimentary bottle of local red or white wine, dining discount and a leisurely late 2pm checkout.
offer_address: 28 Grey St, Wellington, 6011, New Zealand

title: Art Deco-Inspired Wellington Escape in Heritage 1900s Chicago-Style Building with Daily Breakfast
description: Discover the vibrant heart of New Zealand's capital city with a stay at the Art Deco-inspired TRYP by Wyndham Wellington, situated in a heritage 1900s building. This stylish hotel is perfectly located within walking distance of the city's bustling waterfront, Te Papa Museum and the lively Cuba Street. Savour the city's renowned culinary scene with a visit to the nearby Courtenay Place, home to an array of trendy eateries and pumping bars. After a day of urban exploration, retreat to the hotel's chic rooms, each carefully curated to replicate the energy of the city, while paying homage to the Chicago-style architecture of the eye-catching building.
offer_address: 15 Tory Street, Te Aro, Wellington 06011, New Zealand

title: Harbourside Escape in the Heart of Wellington with Daily Breakfast
description:
Brimming with trendy arts and cultural experiences, laidback dining powered by craft breweries, night markets and food trucks, quirky boutiques that line art-sprinkled laneways and jaw-dropping landscapes, Wellington is the place to be - and you can discover it all during a stay at Rydges Wellington.

Perched near the impressive harbour, this centrally located hotel is surrounded by everything you need to ensure a memorable stay in the little capital of cool. Lambton Quay, Sky Stadium, Queens Wharf, Wellington Railway and the ferry terminals are all just a stone's throw away. Hotel facilities include the award-winning Portlander Bar & Grill - a local favourite offering sumptuous steaks, whiskies and wines - a state-of-the-art fitness centre and a 17-metre heated swimming pool with sauna and spa.
offer_address: 75 Featherston St, Pipitea, Wellington 6011, New Zealand

title: Sophisticated Wellington City Break with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
description:
It doesn’t get much cooler than a stay at Rydges Wellington, hidden in the capital branded by Lonely Planet in 2018 as ‘one of the coolest little capitals in the world’. Perched near the waterfront of the iconic harbour, this sophisticated hotel is surrounded by art-sprinkled laneways, quirky boutiques and a cluster of trendy and eclectic bars to rival that of New York City.

With all of this at your doorstep, expect gourmet wining and dining while staying in style with daily continental breakfast, one daily cocktail, house beer, wine or juice per adult, 20% food and drinks discount at the award-winning Portlander Bar & Grill and a luxuriously late 1pm checkout.

**Travelling with family?** Twin double beds are available on request, with two kids 11 years and under staying free (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: 75 Featherston St, Pipitea, Wellington 6011, New Zealand

title: Retro-Chic Boutique Getaway in Wellington
description: Experience New Zealand’s creative and culinary capital in style with three days/two nights at Ohtel Wellington. You’ll feel as though you’ve stepped onto the set of Mad Men at this exclusive, Instagram-worthy, boutique hotel. Enjoy a daily NZ$40 food and beverage credit, complimentary bottle of wine, late midday checkout and guaranteed room upgrade for two.
offer_address: 66 Oriental Parade, Oriental Bay, Wellington 6011, New Zealand

title: Five-Star Mövenpick Central Wellington Escape with Onsite Restaurant, Indoor Pool & Sauna
description:
Experience the best of Wellington in this stylish stay, nestled in the artistic Cuba Quarter, abundant with vibrant galleries, cafe culture and shopping boutiques. When you aren’t uncovering the city’s hidden gems, embark on a gastronomic journey at onsite Forge Restaurant & Bar, featuring New Zealand-inspired cuisine, with a side of panoramic city skyline.

Unwind in the temperature-controlled indoor pool and detoxifying sauna, or perhaps sweat it out at the state-of-the-art fitness centre. Then, when the clock strikes chocolate hour, Mövenpick Hotel Wellington invites you to savour their iconic sweet sensations.
offer_address: 345 The Terrace, Wellington, New Zealand 6001

title: Eclectic QT Escape near Wellington Harbour with Parisian-Inspired Onsite Restaurant
description: Unleash your inner art critic and get lost in the unique, ultra-cool vibes of QT Wellington, located in the middle of the city, just steps from the shimmering harbour. Explore fiery flavours in New Zealand's capital city at Hot Sauce restaurant, whipping up traditional Asian delights and trailblazing cocktails, embrace French sophistication and eclectic décor at Hippopotamus restaurant and get amid the buzz of the Lobby Lounge with the perfect cup of coffee. Venture outside your hotel to discover Wellington's popular attractions, including Museum of New Zealand Te Papa Tongarewa, Wellington Museum and the Underground Market.
offer_address: 90 Cable St, Te Aro, Wellington 6011, New Zealand

title: Central Wellington Novotel Stay Near Lambton Quay & Te Papa Museum
description:
Be mesmerised with the cosmopolitan charm of New Zealand's capital with a stay at this stylish Novotel property. The centrally located hotel offers direct lift access to the vibrant waterfront precinct of Lambton Quay, putting you just moments away from the Te Papa Museum, historic Wellington Cable Car and Botanical Gardens. Wander along the waterfront to explore the city's renowned culinary scene, hopping from craft beer brewery to restaurant and back again. 

Back at the hotel, savour local flavours and sip on fresh cocktails at Caucus Restaurant and Bar, or maintain your fitness routine at the compact gym. Retire to your chic rooms with views of the harbour or city, and call it a day with top-end amenities and unrivalled hospitality.
offer_address: 133 The Terrace, Wellington 6011, New Zealand

title: Boutique Wellington Urban Hideaway near Sky Stadium
description: Commanding a prime position on the city fringe, Atura Wellington makes the perfect base to explore the lively capital of New Zealand. From the visually aesthetic lobby, cutting-edge comforts and calming hues, this sanctuary is a contemporary hideaway and the perfect nod to Wellington's creative culture. When you return from your adventures, head to Frankie's Eatery for home-style food with brasserie-style flair followed by a cocktail or ice-cold pint at Frankie's Bar.
offer_address: 24 Hawkestone Street, Thorndon, Wellington 6011, New Zealand

title: Stylish Wellington Apartment-Style Escape in Thorndon Quay near Sky Stadium
description:
Discover the beauty of New Zealand's capital city with a stay at this stylish apartment-style hotel. This chic retreat is ideally located in the heart of Wellington's Thorndon district, a stone's throw from the historic Old St. Paul's Cathedral and the scenic Wellington Botanic Garden.

In between exploring, retreat to your elegant room or apartment and feel right at home, then seek retail therapy at Lambton Quay Shopping District or head to the Sky Stadium right next door to catch a concert or rugby match. Explore, rest and repeat!
offer_address: 172 Thorndon Quay, Pipitea, Wellington 6011, New Zealand

title: Central Wellington Oasis near Botanic Garden with Restaurant and Bar
description:
Indulge in unparalleled luxury at Sofitel Wellington, perfectly positioned in the heart of New Zealand's vibrant capital. Savor exquisite dining at the renowned Jardin Grill or unwind with a cocktail at the stylish La Serre Bar. Stay active with a visit to the fitness centre or relax in your room, featuring stunning city or garden views.

This retreat is a stone's throw from the city's premier shopping district, Lambton Quay and the beautiful Wellington Botanic Garden. Take a scenic ride on the Wellington Cable Car for panoramic views of the city and harbour, or a short drive away you'll find the Te Papa Museum, where you can delve into the country's rich history and culture.
offer_address: 11 Bolton Street, Wellington Central, Wellington 6011, New Zealand

title: Five-Star InterContinental Wellington Stay Overlooking the Harbour
description: Experience harbourfront luxury at InterContinental Wellington, an IHG Hotel, and get to know New Zealand's quirky capital, where street art-sprayed laneways meet a jaw-dropping mountain backdrop. Your hotel places you in the midst of the action, with the waterfront, Jervois Quay, and the Wellington Cable Car on your doorstep, not to mention the city's renowned arts and dining scene. After busy days exploring, your elegant hotel welcomes you back with its indoor pool, sauna, fitness centre and casual dining venues.
offer_address: 2 Grey Street, Wellington Central, Wellington 6011, New Zealand

title: Stylish City Escape in the Heart of Wellington's Entertainment Precinct
description: Discover Wellington's sophisticated coffee culture, hopping craft beer scene and electric nightlife with a stay at the stylish Oaks Wellington Hotel, nestled in the heart of the city's vibrant entertainment precinct. Wellington's gourmet scene is legendary - and the hotel is the perfect launchpad for travellers looking to experience the city’s countless gastronomic delights. Recently reimagined, Oaks Wellington Hotel pays loving homage to the building’s heritage as a Ford vehicle assembly plant while celebrating its dazzling future. Enjoy every bite at onsite restaurant Oak & Vine, serving modern Kiwi cuisine with a Mediterranean twist, head out for a night on the town or simply sit back and savour the magnificent city views - this is Wellington, your way.
offer_address: 89 Courtenay Place, Te Aro, Wellington 6011, New Zealand

title: Convenient Wellington Airport Stay with Coastal Views
description: Refresh and recharge at Rydges Wellington Airport, a stylish retreat conveniently located within the New Zealand capital city's airport. When you're not checking out the Te Papa and Wellington museums, magical Mt Victoria and lively Cuba Street, enjoy moments of downtime at your hotel, with airport runway and sunset south coast vistas. Home to contemporary rooms, the delicious Whiskey Lima Golf restaurant and the trendy Peloton Bar + Eatery, this hotel offers everything you need for a comfortable stay or layover.
offer_address: 28 Stewart Duff Drive, Rongotai, Wellington 6022, New Zealand
